availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Leroy S. Mitchell (Union County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Union County native. Married to Sarah E. Hooper Mitchell in Union County on May 19, 1854. Father of Douglass Mitchell, Oscar Mitchell, Houston Mitchell, and Alice Mitchell. Farmer in Union County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union, District 1.
